termsNotice.agreement: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

_TermsCheckbox: Terms of Service translations for English

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: The terms and conditions for using the app

1.title: Acceptance of Terms
1.content: Using the app constitutes full acceptance of these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please discontinue use of the app. These terms are designed to ensure safe and pleasant use for all users and to maintain the religious and moral values of the community.

2.title: Service Description
content: AKHLADATE is a dating platform designed for the religious public. The service allows users to create a profile, search for potential partners and communicate.
The platform is designed for those looking for serious and committed relationships while maintaining religious and traditional values.

3.title: Registration and User Account
items: The user undertakes to provide true and accurate information during registration
Minimum age for using the app: 18+ years
It is forbidden to create more than one account per user
The user is responsible for maintaining password confidentiality and access details

4.title: Code of Conduct
items: Behave respectfully and decently towards other users
Do not publish offensive, misleading or illegal content
Do not harass or harm other users in any way
Maintain modesty and traditional values in all communication

5.title: Copyright and Content
content: All content in the app is copyright protected. The user grants a license to use the content they upload for the purpose of operating the service.
The user warrants that the content he uploads does not infringe the copyrights of others and that it is his full property.

6.title: Limitation of Liability
content: The company is not responsible for the results of using the app, including dates, meetings or relationships formed through it.
The user bears full responsibility for his behavior and decisions when using the service.

7.title: Changes to Terms
content: The company reserves the right to update the terms from time to time. Users will be notified of material changes.
Continued use of the application after receiving the notification constitutes agreement to the updated terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Our privacy and data protection policy

1.title: Information Collection
content: We collect information you provide during registration: name, age, location, photos and additional information for profile creation.
We may also collect technical information such as IP address, browser type, and application usage data.

2.title: Information Use
items: Displaying the profile to other users in the system
Improving the service and personalizing recommendations
Communication regarding the service and important updates

3.title: Information Sharing
content: We do not share personal information with third parties, except as required by law or for the operation of the service.
In exceptional cases where we are required to share information, we will do so in accordance with legal requirements and with maximum protection of privacy.

4.title: Data Security
content: We employ advanced security measures to protect your information, including encryption and two-factor authentication.
Our servers are protected by advanced security technologies and are located in secure data centers.

5.title: Your Rights
items: Access your personal information stored in the system
Delete your account and information completely
Limit the use of information for specific purposes

6.title: Cookies
content: We use cookies to improve user experience, save preferences and for analytics.
You can set your browser to block cookies, but this may affect the functionality of the application.

7.title: Contact Us
content: For privacy questions, you can contact us at: privacy@akhladate.com
We commit to responding to inquiries within 48 hours and handling every request professionally and quickly.
